## CypherEditorProps.lineNumberFormatter property

The formatter for the line numbers of the editor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lineNumberFormatter?: LineNumberFormatter;
```

## Default Value

(line, lineCount) =<!-- -->&gt; lineCount === 1 ? "$" : line + "";
